what: a package for calculate gi and hi local spatial statistics
title: a package for calculate gi and hi local spatial statistics
text: denhotspots package development department prevention control vector-borne diseases Secretary Health Veracruz colaboration national dengue prevention control program CENAPRECE entomology laboratory INDRE* goal denhotspots carry spatial analysis dengue: hotspots analysis getis & ord statistics (). Space-time analysis scan statistics Space-time analysis knox test. Log Gaussian Cox Processs Spatial.

title: a package for calculate gi and hi local spatial statistics
text: can install development version denhotspots GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("fdzul/denhotspots") # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("fdzul/denhotspots")

title: a package for calculate gi and hi local spatial statistics
text: Felipe Antonio Dzul Manzanilla -https://github.com/fdzul - Packages developed github: boldenr. dendata. deneggs. rgeomex. covid19mx. Fabian Correa Morales - See also list contributors participated project.

title: a package for calculate gi and hi local spatial statistics

title: a package for calculate gi and hi local spatial statistics
text: package inspired need contribute public policies decision-making Program Prevention Control Arboviruses Mexico, specifically analysis spatial dengue (cases abundance mosquitoes).

title: a package for calculate gi and hi local spatial statistics
text: encounter clear bug, please file minimal reproducible example github. questions discussion, please feel free contact (felipe.dzul.m@gmail.com) Please note project released Contributor Code Conduct. participating project agree abide terms.

title: gihi — gihi
text: Calculate gi hi local spatial statistic

title: gihi — gihi
code: gihi(x, gi_hi, id, dis, time, alpha = NULL)

title: gihi — gihi
text: x sf object number events spatial unit gi_hi Define local spatial statistic. includes three options ("gi", "hi", "gi_hi", "gi" calculates spatial local statistic getis & ord, "hi" calculates hi, "gi_hi" calculates statistic id identifiers spatial unit dis prefix variable name. Example den_2018 denv_2018, dis den denv time unit time time scale analyzed time series. example years, times, months, weeks alpha value alpha determine threshold value gi discriminate hotspots non-hotspots

title: gihi — gihi
text: sf object ids intensity hotspots hi, gi .

title: gihi — gihi
text: Getis , Ord JK. 1992. analysis spatial association use distance statistics.Geographical Analysis, 24(2):189-206. Ord JK, Getis . 1995. Local spatial autocorrelation statistics: distributional issues application. Geographical Analysis, 27, 286–306. Ord JK,  Getis . 2012. Local spatial heteroscedasticity (LOSH), Annals Regional Science, 48 (2), 529–539. Bivand RS, Wong DWS. 2018. Comparing implementations global local indicators spatial association. TEST, 27(3), 716–748.

title: gihi — gihi
text: Felipe Antonio Dzul Manzanilla felipe.dzul.m@gmail.com

title: knox test — knox
text: function implement space-time analysis knox test

title: knox test — knox
code: knox(x, crs, dt, ds, sym, sp_link, planar_coord)

title: knox test — knox
text: x dataset coordinates onset symptoms crs coordinate reference system. dt temporal windows. ds spatial windows. sym MonteCarlo replications number. sp_link logical value. sp_link true space-time link  built sp, else sf. planar_coord logical value.planar_coord false, dataset projected planar system.

title: knox test — knox
text: list three elements: knox, st_link, space-time link.      - *knox* list three elements: knox Knox statistic, number pairs points found given space-time distance. p_value p-value calculated MonteCarlo simulation. RR Relative Risk - calculated observed value (Knox statistics) divided mean simulated values. - *st_link* origen-destination dataset class dataframe. dataset four variables: Xo longitude point origin. Yo latitud point origin. Xd longitude destination point. Yd latitud destination point. - *space-time link* sf object (LINESTRING) crs 4326.

title: knox test — knox
text: function implements space-time analysis knox test. x dataframe three variables: x (longitude), y (latitude) onset (onset symptoms)      coordinates projected planar system.      function rknox test use (knox)[https://github.com/thanhleviet/knox] package (github)[https://github.com/].

title: knox test — knox
text: Knox, E. (1964). detection space-time interactions. Journal Royal Statistical Society. Series C (13(1), 25-30. Tango, T. (2010). Statistical methods disease clustering. Springer.

title: knox test — knox
text: Felipe Antonio Dzul Manzanilla felipe.dzul.m@gmail.com

what: Spatial Log Gaussian Cox Process — spatial_lgcp
title: Spatial Log Gaussian Cox Process — spatial_lgcp
text: spatial_lgcp objective performing spatial analysis log gaussian cox process model order predict intensity cases urban metropolitan endemic dengue locations Mexico.

title: Spatial Log Gaussian Cox Process — spatial_lgcp
code: spatial_lgcp(   dataset,   locality,   cve_edo,   longitude,   latitude,   k,   plot,   resolution,   aproximation,   integration,   approach,   cell_size = NULL,   name )

title: Spatial Log Gaussian Cox Process — spatial_lgcp
text: dataset dengue geocoded dataset. locality locality target. cve_edo text id state.. longitude name column longitude geocoded dataset. latitude name column latitude geocoded dataset. k parameter define triagulization delauney inner outer area argument max.edge INLA:inla.mesh.2d. plot logical value plot mesh. resolution value set resolution locality raster. resolution 0.1  = 11.132 km, 0.009  = 1.00 km, 0.005  = 500 m, 0.0027  = 300 m, & 0.001 = 100 m. aproximation aproximation aproximation joint posterior marginals hyperparameter. options "adaptative", "gaussian", "simplified.laplace" & "laplace". integration integration integration strategy. options "auto","grid", "eb" & "ccd". approach algorithm spatial Log Gaussian Cox Process. option "lattice", "inlabru" & "simpson" according Illian 2012, Bachl et al 2018 & Simpson et al 2016,respectively. cell_size sample number per location (area locality/n) name name palette.

title: Spatial Log Gaussian Cox Process — spatial_lgcp
text: list several object.
